text: Edmund Beckett, 1st Baron Grimthorpe, QC (12 May 1816 â€“ 29 April 1905), known previously as Sir Edmund Beckett, 5th Baronet and Edmund Beckett Denison, was a "lawyer, mechanician and controversialist" as well as a notable horologist and architect.
